hello_welcome: Fullstack developer and passionate about my work
presentation_text_1: Hello, my name is Guillaume and I really enjoy practicing this profession, in which I lose track of time. I love taking on new challenges and learning from them.
presentation_text_2: Resilient and persistent by nature, I invest a lot in the projects I undertake and commit to delivering high-quality work.
presentation_text_3: You can discover the details of my expertise further down on this page, as well as through this very website.
presentation_text_4: If you're interested in my profile or need my services, don't hesitate to contact me via my contact form
presentation_text_5: Apart from IT, I'm a nature lover and always amazed by the beauty of landscapes our planet has to offer.
presentation_text_6: That's why, through this website, I wanted to share photos of all my journeys.
presentation_text_7: I am passionate about creating innovative tech solutions, with a strong focus on continuous improvement and efficiency. I've worked on several exciting projects and gained expertise in various languages and tools. I firmly believe that technology should not only solve problems but also improve users' quality of life.

conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
conditions.intro_text: These Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) govern access to and use of the website guillaume-quesnel.com accessible at https://guillaume-quesnel.com. By using this website, you agree to the terms and conditions outlined below.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using this website, you accept these T&Cs. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this website.

access.title: 3. Access to the Website
access.text: Access to the website is free, but it may be subject to restrictions. We reserve the right to restrict access to certain sections or the entire website for technical or legal reasons.

intellectual_property.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: All content on the website guillaume-quesnel.com (texts, images, logos, videos, etc.) is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction or use of the content is prohibited.

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibility
responsibility.text: The website guillaume-quesnel.com cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of this website, including errors in the content, service interruptions, or data loss.

personal_data.title: 6. Personal Data
personal_data.text: The website collects personal data only in connection with the functionalities offered by the site. The information collected is processed in accordance with the website's privacy policy.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.text: The website uses cookies to improve user experience. By continuing to browse this site, you consent to the use of these cookies.

modification.title: 8. Modification of T&Cs
modification.text: The website reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Any changes will be published on this page and will take effect immediately.

law.title: 9. Applicable Law
law.text: These T&Cs are governed by French law. In the event of a dispute, the competent courts will be those located in the jurisdiction of the website's headquarters.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us via email at admin@guillaume-quesnel.com.

mentions_legales.title: Legal Notice
mentions_legales.intro_text: This legal notice governs access to and use of the website. By accessing this site, you accept the terms and conditions set out in this document.

publisher.title: 2. Website Publisher
publisher.text: The website is published by Guillaume QUESNEL, reachable via email at admin@guillaume-quesnel.com.

director.title: 3. Publication Director
director.text: The publication director is Guillaume QUESNEL.

host.title: 4. Hosting
host.text: OVH SAS, with a capital of €10,174,560, headquartered at: 2 rue Kellermann - 59100 Roubaix – France, registered at the RCS Lille Métropole under number: 424 761 419 00045.

responsibility.title: 5. Responsibility
responsibility.text: The site guillaume-quesnel.com makes every effort to provide accurate and up-to-date information but cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or update of the information available on the site. The site cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the site, including but not limited to errors in the content, interruptions, or data loss.

intellectual_property.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.text: All content on the site, including texts, images, logos, videos, and other elements, is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. Any unauthorized reproduction or use is prohibited.

links.title: 7. Hyperlinks
links.text: Links to other sites may be present. We disclaim all responsibility for their content or privacy policies.

data_protection.title: 8. Personal Data Protection
data_protection.text: In accordance with the applicable legislation, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), this site collects certain personal data (name, surname, email address, etc.) for the following purposes: user management. Users have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, transfer, and object to the processing of their personal data. These rights can be exercised by sending a request via email to admin@guillaume-quesnel.com. The collected data is kept for a duration of 5 years and will not be used for purposes other than those specified above. The site uses cookies to enhance the user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

jurisdiction.title: 9. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.text: These legal notices are governed by French law. In case of a dispute, French courts will have jurisdiction.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any questions, please contact me via the contact form or at the email address admin@guillaume-quesnel.com.

politique_confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
politique_confidentialite.intro_text: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, protect, and share your personal data.

data_collection.title: 2. Data Collection
data_collection.text: We collect personal data only when necessary for the proper functioning of our site. This may include information such as your name, email address, IP address, geolocation data, and other information you voluntarily provide.

use_of_data.title: 3. Use of Data
use_of_data.text: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience on the site, and respond to your requests. We will never share your data with third parties without your explicit consent. The legal basis for processing is your consent, the performance of a contract, or legitimate interest depending on the nature of the processing.

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.text: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

cookies.title: 5. Use of Cookies
cookies.text: This site uses cookies to improve the user experience. By using our site, you consent to the use of cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences via your browser or our cookie manager.

third_party_services.title: 6. Third-Party Services
third_party_services.text: We may use third-party services such as Google Analytics to analyze site usage and improve our services. These services may collect information such as your IP address and browsing data on our site. This information is used exclusively to improve our site.

user_rights.title: 7. User Rights
user_rights.text: Under applicable law, you have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the use of your personal data. You can also withdraw your consent at any time.

data_retention.title: 8. Data Retention
data_retention.text: We will retain your personal data for as long as necessary to meet your needs or for the purposes outlined in this policy. Emails and usernames are retained as long as the account is active, and for a maximum of 5 years after deactivation or inactivity. Photos, articles, and comments posted by users are retained as long as the account is active. Upon deactivation, this content may be anonymized or deleted upon request within a maximum of 5 years, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

policy_updates.title: 9. Privacy Policy Updates
policy_updates.text: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to regularly review this policy to stay informed of any updates.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at the following address: admin@guillaume-quesnel.com.

comment_moderation.title: Comment Moderation
comment_moderation.text: Comments posted on our website must follow the standards of conduct and respect. We reserve the right to moderate any inappropriate comment or comment that does not comply with the community rules. Offensive, hateful, or discriminatory comments will be deleted.

photo_moderation.title: Photo Moderation
photo_moderation.text: Uploaded photos must respect copyright and should not be shocking or inappropriate. Any photo violating our platform's rules will be removed, and the user may face sanctions.

droits_auteur.title: Copyright Compliance
droits_auteur.respect_text: Content published on our site must respect copyright and intellectual property rights. Any unauthorized use of copyrighted content, including images, videos, and text, is prohibited.
droits_auteur.protection_text: We take measures to protect authors' rights and are committed to removing any content that infringes copyright. Users who violate copyright laws may face penalties.
